revised_title: Kew Magnetic Data: Diurnal Inequalities of Horizontal and Vertical Forces from 1890 to 1900
tldr: The author analyzes the magnetic data from Kew Observatory, focusing on the diurnal inequalities of horizontal and vertical forces from 1890 to 1900. The study examines 209 disturbed days and 3808 ordinary days, providing insights into the regularities and irregularities of magnetic phenomena.
